name: mdlab-direct-backend
description: Backend API for MDLAB Direct Laboratory Management System

scripts.health: node -e "const http = require('http'); http.get('http://localhost:5000/api/health', res => { let data = ''; res.on('data', chunk => data += chunk); res.on('end', () => console.log(JSON.parse(data))); }).on('error', err => console.error('Health check failed:', err.message));"

author: MDLAB Direct Team
